response.overview: En route to the annual G7 summit, the seven leaders of the world’s wealthiest liberal democracies get lost in the woods and face increasing peril while attempting to draft a provisional statement regarding a global crisis.
response.tagline: The Official Motion Picture of the G7.
response.title: Rumours

release_dates.note: Festival du nouveau cinéma de Montréal
